ygData.subject: Re: Level 24 Pet
ygData.msgSnippet: ... 29th level pet.  I am desperately looking for the 24th pet spell now or word of detchment, if anybody has them for sale on Innoruuk please tell me!  I m
ygData.messageBody:
>It wasn't in Grobb the other day - the 20th level pet was there and the
29th level pet. I am desperately looking for the 24th pet spell now or word
of >detchment, if anybody has them for sale on Innoruuk please tell me! I'm
only 21 so I have 3 levels before I need it.

This would explain the constant requests for me to research that pet...I
wondered why, but I figured they had obtained the words already and figured
they could save a few plat. Don't Shadowknights get that pet? If they
do...it must be for sale *somewhere* they sure aren't going to research
it...
